body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Select one model in your unit that is equipped with a weapon with the [BLAST] ability. Until the end of the phase, when determining how many models are in the target unit for the purpose of that ability, include models that are not visible to the attacking model. In addition, attacks made with that weapon can be allocated to models that are not visible to the attacking model.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.

In addition, attacks made with that weapon can be allocated to models that are not visible to the attacking model.

body.when: Any phase, just after you have made a Hit roll, a Wound roll, a Damage roll, a saving throw, an Advance roll, a Charge roll, a Desperate Escape test, a Hazardous test, or just after you have rolled the dice to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon, for an attack, model or unit from your army.
body.target: That unit or model from your army.
body.effect: You re-roll that roll, test or saving throw.

body.when: Any phase, just after you have made a Hit roll, a Wound roll, a Damage roll, a saving throw, an Advance roll, a Charge roll, a Desperate Escape test, a Hazardous test, or just after you have rolled the dice to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon, for an attack, model or unit from your army.
body.target: That unit or model from your army.
body.effect: You re-roll that roll, test or saving throw.

body.when: Battle-shock step of your Command phase, just after you have failed a Battle-shock test taken for a unit from your army.
body.target: The unit from your army that Battle-shock test was just taken for (even though your Battle-shocked units cannot normally be affected by your Stratagems).
body.effect: Your unit is treated as having passed that test instead, and is not Battle-shocked as a result.

body.when: Battle-shock step of your Command phase, just after you have failed a Battle-shock test taken for a unit from your army.
body.target: The unit from your army that Battle-shock test was just taken for (even though your Battle-shocked units cannot normally be affected by your Stratagems).
body.effect: Your unit is treated as having passed that test instead, and is not Battle-shocked as a result.

body.when: Start or end of any phase.
body.target: One Leader unit from your army and one friendly Bodyguard unit within 6" of it that it could normally be attached to.
body.effect: Select one of your Leader unit’s Leader abilities. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Bodyguard unit is treated as being led by that Leader unit for the purposes of that Leader ability.
body.restriction: Once you target a unit with this Stratagem, that unit cannot be targeted with it again until your next Command phase.

body.when: Start or end of any phase.
body.target: One Leader unit from your army and one friendly Bodyguard unit within 6" of it that it could normally be attached to.
body.effect: Select one of your Leader unit’s Leader abilities. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Bodyguard unit is treated as being led by that Leader unit for the purposes of that Leader ability.
body.restriction: Once you target a unit with this Stratagem, that unit cannot be targeted with it again until your next Command phase.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has fought.
body.target: One unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and that has not already been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Your unit fights next.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or your Fight phase.
body.target: One unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or your Fight phase.
body.target: One unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, add D6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, add D6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

body.when: End of your Shooting phase.
body.target: One unit from your army (excluding units that made a move this phase).
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", and then cannot move again this phase.

body.when: End of your Shooting phase.
body.target: One unit from your army (excluding units that made a move this phase).
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", and then cannot move again this phase.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of one or more units from your army and is within 6" of and visible to your unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.

body.effect: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of one or more units from your army and is within 6" of and visible to your unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal or Advance move, it can move horizontally through models and terrain features.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal or Advance move, it can move horizontally through models and terrain features.

body.when: Start of your Shooting phase.
body.target: One unit from your army (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

body.when: Start of your Shooting phase.
body.target: One unit from your army (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

body.when: Your Fight phase.
body.target: One unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3". In addition, it does not need to end that move closer to the closest enemy model, provided it ends it as close as possible to the closest enemy unit.

body.when: Your Fight phase.
body.target: One unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3". In addition, it does not need to end that move closer to the closest enemy model, provided it ends it as close as possible to the closest enemy unit.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or your Fight phase.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.

body.effect: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have a 6+ invulnerable save and have the Benefit of Cover.

body.when: Fight phase, when a CHARACTER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more Attached units is selected to fight.
body.target: One CHARACTER model in your unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, all melee attacks made by that model have the [PRECISION] ability.

body.when: Fight phase, when a CHARACTER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more Attached units is selected to fight.
body.target: One CHARACTER model in your unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, all melee attacks made by that model have the [PRECISION] ability.

body.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
body.target: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase.
body.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase.
body.restriction: You can only select a VEHICLE unit from your army if it is a WALKER. Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

body.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
body.target: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase.
body.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase.
body.restriction: You can only select a VEHICLE unit from your army if it is a WALKER. Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

body.when: Your Charge phase, just after a VEHICLE unit from your army ends a Charge move.
body.target: That VEHICLE unit.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, and select one VEHICLE model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. Roll a number of D6 equal to the Toughness characteristic of the selected VEHICLE model. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

body.when: Your Charge phase, just after a VEHICLE unit from your army ends a Charge move.
body.target: That VEHICLE unit.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, and select one VEHICLE model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. Roll a number of D6 equal to the Toughness characteristic of the selected VEHICLE model. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

body.when: End of your opponent’s Movement phase.
body.target: One unit from your army that is in Reserves.
body.effect: Your unit can arrive on the battlefield as if it were the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase, and if every model in that unit has the Deep Strike ability, you can set that unit up as described in the Deep Strike ability (even though it is not your Movement phase).
body.restriction: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive on the battlefield during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Movement phase.

body.restriction: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive on the battlefield during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement or Charge phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, or declares a charge.
body.target: One unit from your army that is within 24" of that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if it were your Shooting phase.
body.effect: If that enemy unit is visible to your unit, your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase.
body.restriction: You cannot target a TITANIC unit with this Stratagem. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit, irrespective of the attacking weapon’s Ballistic Skill or any modifiers. You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.

body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PISTOL] ability. If one or more of those weapons already have this ability, then until the end of the phase, each time an attack is made with such a weapon that targets a unit within 6", add 1 to the Hit roll.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 3+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

body.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 3+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within range of your Acquisition objective marker, add 1 to the Wound roll.

body.when: Fight phase, just before an ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army Consolidates.
body.target: That ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3", provided your unit ends that Consolidation move within range of your Acquisition objective marker.
body.restriction: You cannot target a unit with this Stratagem if it is within 3" of one or more enemy units.

body.when: Fight phase, just before an ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army Consolidates.

body.restriction: You cannot target a unit with this Stratagem if it is within 3" of one or more enemy units.

body.when: Any phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that was just destroyed while it was within range of an objective marker you controlled. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

body.when: Any phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that was just destroyed while it was within range of an objective marker you controlled. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

body.effect: Your unit can embark within that TRANSPORT.
body.restriction: Every model in your unit must be within 3" of that TRANSPORT and there must be sufficient transport capacity to embark the entire unit.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1, and, if it is a HALO OVERRIDE unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army.
body.effect: If your unit is a HALO OVERRIDE unit, it suffers D3 mortal wounds. Select one Override ability. Until the start of your next Command phase, that ability is active for your unit.Designer’s Note: This means that if the targeted unit already has the HALO OVERRIDE keyword, it can be affected by multiple Override abilities at the same time, but suffers mortal wounds to do so. Alternatively, if your unit does not have the HALO OVERRIDE keyword, it instead has the chosen Override ability until the start of your next Command phase, but does not benefit from any other Override abilities that are active.

body.when: Your Movement phase.

body.effect: If your unit is a HALO OVERRIDE unit, it suffers D3 mortal wounds. Select one Override ability. Until the start of your next Command phase, that ability is active for your unit.Designer’s Note: This means that if the targeted unit already has the HALO OVERRIDE keyword, it can be affected by multiple Override abilities at the same time, but suffers mortal wounds to do so. Alternatively, if your unit does not have the HALO OVERRIDE keyword, it instead has the chosen Override ability until the start of your next Command phase, but does not benefit from any other Override abilities that are active.

body.when: Start of the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
body.target: One AELDARI VEHICLE unit from your army that can FLY and is in Strategic Reserves.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Deep Strike ability. When your unit is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, it can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units, but if it does, until the end of the turn, it is not eligible to declare a charge. In addition, if your unit is a TRANSPORT, each unit that disembarks from it this turn must be set up more than 6" horizontally from all enemy units and until the end of the turn, is not eligible to declare a charge.

body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Charge move, it can move horizontally through terrain features as if they were not there.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after a SQUADRON unit from your army Falls Back.
body.target: That SQUADRON unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after a SQUADRON unit from your army Falls Back.

body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.

body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if it is a REGIMENT model. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model loses a wound, while that model’s unit is within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6: on a 4+, one model from your unit is destroyed after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks.

In addition, if it is a CALLIDUS ASSASSIN unit and it makes a Charge move as a result of this Stratagem, until the end of the turn, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH MONSTER unit from your army that is on the battlefield.
body.effect: Each unit on the battlefield that is within your army’s Shadow of Chaos must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test if they are Below Half-strength.Designer’s Note: This Stratagem forces all friendly and enemy units alike within your army’s Shadow of Chaos to take a Battle-shock test. This can allow a Chaos Daemons player to heal units from their army through the Daemonic Terror army rule, at the risk of causing some of their own units to become Battle-shocked.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Roll one D6, then you can spend one Flux token to re-roll the result: until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, on an unmodified Hit roll (after any re-roll) of that result, the attack sequence ends, even if the original Hit roll would have been a Critical Hit.Example: If you roll a 2 and choose to spend one Flux token to re-roll the result, and the re-roll is a 6, then until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, on an unmodified Hit roll of 6 the attack sequence ends, that attack fails to hit and no Critical Hit effects (e.g. Lethal Hits) are resolved.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.

body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3", provided your unit ends that Consolidation move within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army that made a Charge move this turn and has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army that made a Charge move this turn and has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

body.when: Your opponent’s Command phase.
body.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army that made a Charge move in the previous turn and destroyed one or more enemy units in the previous Fight phase.
body.effect: Each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test if they are Below Half-strength. Enemy units affected by this Stratagem do not need to take any other Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

body.when: Your opponent’s Command phase.
body.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army that made a Charge move in the previous turn and destroyed one or more enemy units in the previous Fight phase.
body.effect: Each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test if they are Below Half-strength. Enemy units affected by this Stratagem do not need to take any other Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit Falls Back.
body.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army (you can only select a VEHICLE if it is a WALKER) that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase.
body.effect: Your unit can declare a charge. When doing so, you must select that enemy unit as a target of that charge, and your unit does not receive a Charge bonus this turn.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through enemy models (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES). When doing so, it can move within Engagement Range of such models but cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them, and any Desperate Escape test is automatically passed.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through enemy models (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES). When doing so, it can move within Engagement Range of such models but cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them, and any Desperate Escape test is automatically passed.

body.when: End of the Fight phase.
body.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army that destroyed an enemy unit this phase, and one friendly TRANSPORT it is able to embark within.
body.effect: If your EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit is wholly within 6" of that TRANSPORT, it can embark within it.

body.when: End of the Fight phase.
body.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army that destroyed an enemy unit this phase, and one friendly TRANSPORT it is able to embark within.
body.effect: If your EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit is wholly within 6" of that TRANSPORT, it can embark within it.

body.when: Your Command phase.

body.effect: Select one objective marker you control that your TRANSPORT is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN TRANSPORT from your army that has one or more TORMENTORS units embarked within it (excluding Battle-shocked units).

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.

body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit is eligible to declare a charge.

body.effect: For each of those TRANSPORTS wholly within 9" of one or more battlefield edges, remove it from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an EMPEROR’S CHILDREN CHARACTER unit becomes your army’s Favoured Champions, or just after your army’s Favoured Champions unit destroys an enemy unit.

body.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more units from your army. Until the end of the phase, each time your unit declares a charge, if that enemy unit is one of the targets of that charge, add 2 to the Charge roll.

body.effect: Each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle round.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an EMPEROR’S CHILDREN CHARACTER unit becomes your army’s Favoured Champions.
body.target: That EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit.
body.effect: Each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN CHARACTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: After the attacking unit has shot, your unit can make a Surge move. To do so, roll one D6: each model in your unit can move a distance in inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. If your unit is not your army’s Favoured Champions, you can re-roll the dice to determine the distance of its Surge move.

body.when: Your Movement or Charge phase.

body.effect: Until the end of the phase, when makinga Normal, Advance or Charge move, your unit can move through a single closed Hatchway as if it was open. When doing so, that Hatchway is opened and cannot be closed for the rest of the battle. This can allow that unit to declare a charge against enemy units that are not visible to it, but to do so those enemy units must be within 1" of that Hatchway and wholly on the opposite side of it from your unit.
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.

If this is not possible, your unit is destroyed.

To do so, roll one D6: each model in your unit can move a distance in inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. If your unit contains 10 or more models, you can re-roll the D6 to determine how far your unit can move.

cards.title: ONLY IN DEATH DOES DUTY END

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.

body.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, improve your model’s Move, Toughness, Leadership and Objective Control characteristics by 1 and each time your model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES WALKER model from your army.
body.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, improve your model’s Move, Toughness, Leadership and Objective Control characteristics by 1 and each time your model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE unit from your army that was reduced to Below Half-strength as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE unit from your army that was reduced to Below Half-strength as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

body.when: Any phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability is destroyed.
body.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE model. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your model’s Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted.

body.when: Any phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability is destroyed.
body.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE model. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your model’s Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted.

body.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was just charged by an enemy unit.
body.effect: Select either the Strength or Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit. Until the end of the turn, add 1 to the selected characteristic. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the turn, add 1 to the Strength and Attacks characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit.

body.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was just charged by an enemy unit.
body.effect: Select either the Strength or Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit. Until the end of the turn, add 1 to the selected characteristic. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the turn, add 1 to the Strength and Attacks characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Select either the [LANCE] or [LETHAL HITS] abilities. Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, then it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] and [LETHAL HITS] abilities.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Select either the [LANCE] or [LETHAL HITS] abilities. Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, then it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] and [LETHAL HITS] abilities.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army Falls Back.
body.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to either shoot or declare a charge even though it Fell Back. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to both shoot and declare a charge, even though it Fell Back.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army Falls Back.
body.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to either shoot or declare a charge even though it Fell Back. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to both shoot and declare a charge, even though it Fell Back.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after an Adeptus Astartes unit from your army has Advanced.
body.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to either shoot or declare a charge, even though it Advanced. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to both shoot and declare a charge, even though it Advanced.

body.when: Any phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army has a mortal wound allocated to it.
body.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds.

body.when: Any phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army has a mortal wound allocated to it.
body.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, that attack has the [LETHAL HITS] ability, and the [IGNORES COVER] ability as well if the Divination Discipline is active for your army.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, that attack has the [LETHAL HITS] ability, and the [IGNORES COVER] ability as well if the Divination Discipline is active for your army.

body.when: Command phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER unit from your army.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit that is within 18" of and visible to one PSYKER model in your unit. Until the start of your next turn, that enemy unit is pinned. While a unit is pinned, subtract 2 from that unit’s Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for it. In addition, if the Telepathy Discipline is active for your army, that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

body.when: Command phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER unit from your army.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit that is within 18" of and visible to one PSYKER model in your unit. Until the start of your next turn, that enemy unit is pinned. While a unit is pinned, subtract 2 from that unit’s Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for it. In addition, if the Telepathy Discipline is active for your army, that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 18" of one or more friendly ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER models, and that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll, and if the Pyromancy Discipline is active for your army, weapons that target your unit have the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 18" of one or more friendly ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER models, and that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll, and if the Pyromancy Discipline is active for your army, weapons that target your unit have the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER unit from your army that is eligible to shoot.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to one or more PSYKER models in your unit (excluding units with the Lone Operative ability), and roll six D6, adding 1 to each result if the Telekinesis Discipline is active for your army: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER unit from your army that is eligible to shoot.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to one or more PSYKER models in your unit (excluding units with the Lone Operative ability), and roll six D6, adding 1 to each result if the Telekinesis Discipline is active for your army: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 18" of one or more ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER models from your army and has not been selected to Fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit, or add 2 if the Biomancy Discipline is active for your army.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 18" of one or more ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER models from your army and has not been selected to Fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit, or add 2 if the Biomancy Discipline is active for your army.

body.when: Your Shooting phase, just after a RAVENWING unit from your army has selected its targets.
body.target: That RAVENWING unit.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within 12" of your unit that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly DEATHWING unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

body.when: Your Shooting phase, just after a RAVENWING unit from your army has selected its targets.
body.target: That RAVENWING unit.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within 12" of your unit that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly DEATHWING unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: If that enemy unit is within Engagement Range of one or more RAVENWING units from your army, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. If that enemy unit is within Engagement Range of one or more DEATHWING units from your army, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of the target, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
body.restriction: A unit cannot be targeted by this and the Armour of Contempt Stratagem in the same phase.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: If that enemy unit is within Engagement Range of one or more RAVENWING units from your army, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. If that enemy unit is within Engagement Range of one or more DEATHWING units from your army, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of the target, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
body.restriction: A unit cannot be targeted by this and the Armour of Contempt Stratagem in the same phase.

body.when: Command phase or the start of the Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. When doing so, if your unit has the DEATHWING or RAVENWING keyword, subtract 1 from the result.
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle round.

body.when: Command phase or the start of the Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. When doing so, if your unit has the DEATHWING or RAVENWING keyword, subtract 1 from the result.
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle round.

body.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that only targets one or more of those enemy units, and you resolve that charge.
body.restriction: Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

body.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit and roll one D6: on a 2-4, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 5+, that enemy unit suffers 2 mortal wounds.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.

body.effect: Until the end of the phase, after that enemy unit has shot, if one or more models in your unit were destroyed as a result of those attacks, your unit can make an Impetuous move. To do so, roll one D6: your unit can be moved a number of inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One WULFEN INFANTRY or BLOOD CLAWS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, after that enemy unit has shot, if one or more models in your unit were destroyed as a result of those attacks, your unit can make an Impetuous move. To do so, roll one D6: your unit can be moved a number of inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.

body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6". If your unit has the SPACE WOLVES INFANTRY or THUNDERWOLF CAVALRY keywords, it can make a Normal move of up to 6" instead.

When doing so, it can move within Engagement Range of enemy models, but unless it is making a Charge move, it cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them.

body.target: One SPACE WOLVES unit from your army that is wholly within 9" of one or more battlefield edges and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

body.when: Your Movement phase.

body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move through models (excluding TITANIC models) and sections of terrain features that are 4" or less in height. When doing so: It can move within Engagement Range of enemy models, but cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them. It can also move through sections of terrain features that are more than 4" in height, but if it does, after its unit has moved, roll one D6: on a 1, your unit is Battle-shocked.

body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.

body.when: Your Movement or Charge phase.
body.target: One WORLD EATERS TERMINATOR, EIGHTBOUND or EXALTED EIGHTBOUND unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase and has not declared a charge this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, when making a Normal, Advance or Charge move, your unit can move through a single closed Hatchway as if it was open. When doing so, that Hatchway is opened and cannot be closed for the rest of the battle. This can allow that unit to declare a charge against enemy units that are not visible to it, but to do so those enemy units must be within 1" of that Hatchway and wholly on the opposite side of it from your unit.
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.

body.when: Fight phase, just after a WORLD EATERS TERMINATOR, EIGHTBOUND or EXALTED EIGHTBOUND unit from your army destroys an enemy unit.
body.target: That unit.
body.effect: Select one objective marker that your unit or the destroyed unit was within range of at the start of the phase. That objective marker is Secured by your army.

body.when: Fight phase, just after a WORLD EATERS TERMINATOR, EIGHTBOUND or EXALTED EIGHTBOUND unit from your army destroys an enemy unit.
body.target: That unit.
body.effect: Select one objective marker that your unit or the destroyed unit was within range of at the start of the phase. That objective marker is Secured by your army.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One WORLD EATERS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll, or, if it is a VESSEL OF WRATH unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll instead.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One WORLD EATERS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll, or, if it is a VESSEL OF WRATH unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll instead.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One KHORNE BERZERKERS or JAKHALS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase and is within 8" of one or more friendly WORLD EATERS CHARACTER models.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of melee weapons equipped by non-CHARACTER models in your unit by 1.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One KHORNE BERZERKERS or JAKHALS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase and is within 8" of one or more friendly WORLD EATERS CHARACTER models.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of melee weapons equipped by non-CHARACTER models in your unit by 1.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One WORLD EATERS INFANTRY, WORLD EATERS MOUNTED or WORLD EATERS DAEMON PRINCE unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One WORLD EATERS INFANTRY, WORLD EATERS MOUNTED or WORLD EATERS DAEMON PRINCE unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
body.target: One WORLD EATERS INFANTRY, WORLD EATERS MOUNTED or WORLD EATERS DAEMON PRINCE unit from your army that lost one or more wounds as a result of those attacks.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Blood Surge move. To do so, roll one D6: models in your unit move a number of inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. If your unit is a KHORNE BERZERKERS or VESSEL OF WRATH unit, you can re-roll the D6 to determine how far your unit can move.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
body.target: One WORLD EATERS INFANTRY, WORLD EATERS MOUNTED or WORLD EATERS DAEMON PRINCE unit from your army that lost one or more wounds as a result of those attacks.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Blood Surge move. To do so, roll one D6: models in your unit move a number of inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. If your unit is a KHORNE BERZERKERS or VESSEL OF WRATH unit, you can re-roll the D6 to determine how far your unit can move.

body.when: End of the Fight phase.
body.target: One WORLD EATERS unit from your army that destroyed one or more enemy models with a melee attack this phase.
body.effect: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

body.when: End of the Fight phase.
body.target: One WORLD EATERS unit from your army that destroyed one or more enemy models with a melee attack this phase.
body.effect: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) is selected to Fall Back.
body.target: One WORLD EATERS INFANTRY or WORLD EATERS DAEMON PRINCE unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
body.effect: When that enemy unit Falls Back, all models in that enemy unit must take a Desperate Escape test. When doing so, if your unit is a VESSEL OF WRATH unit, subtract 1 from each of those tests.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) is selected to Fall Back.
body.target: One WORLD EATERS INFANTRY or WORLD EATERS DAEMON PRINCE unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
body.effect: When that enemy unit Falls Back, all models in that enemy unit must take a Desperate Escape test. When doing so, if your unit is a VESSEL OF WRATH unit, subtract 1 from each of those tests.
